DOC.brief_summary: The member National Evidence-based Healthcare Collaborating Agency plan committee Korean Association hepato-biliary pancreatic Surgery establish protocol Korean Surgical Quality Improvement Program ( KSQIP ) verify variable American College Surgeons - National Surgical Quality Improvement Program ( ACS-NSQIP National Clinical Database ( NCD ) Japan ; demographic , preoperative information , laboratory value , operation finding , general occurrence , postoperative occurrence , follow-up data develop post cholecystectomy complication risk model . The 50 surgeon 20 hospital decide participated primary prospective study apply KSQIP cholecystectomy . The investigator develop web-based database system ( http : //www.ksqip.org/gb ) surgical clinical reviewer hospital fill case report form . Finally , investigator provide risk-adjusted surgical risk calculator feedback system reduce complication .
DOC.criteria: Patient underwent cholecystectomy cholecystitis gallbladder polyp cholelithiasis Under 18 age Who undergo abdominal surgery simultaneously Gallbladder Cancer , cholangiocarcinoma Who agree participation
